nodes.text: Varykino was an island in a lake at the Lake Country of Naboo that housed the Varykino Villa.
Around 1 ABY, the Lake Retreat hosted a large Life Day celebration. A group of Wookiees, including Kkatamik, traveled to the island in order to spread the ideals of Life Day.

The Lake Retreat appeared as a city in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. With the release of the "Publish 11.5" on December 14, 2004, the Lake Retreat was the host of the yearly in-game event known as the Wookiee Life Day. The Life Day event was later completely revamped and moved to other cities the subsequent years.
